title: 113_hr2457
content: Women's Preventive Health Awareness Campaign - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to: (1) provide for the planning and implementation of a national public outreach and educational campaign to raise public awareness, including provider awarenesss, of women's preventive health. And (2) establish a national media campaign and maintain and update an appropriate Internet website as part of such campaign.
